General.Name: Kitron ASA
General.Description: Kitron ASA operates as an electronics manufacturing services company in Norway, Sweden, rest of Europe, the United States, and internationally. It manufactures electronics that are embedded in the customers' products; and box-built electronic products. The company's services include development services, such as product development, product management, and re-engineering services; and industrialization services, including prototype manufacturing, evaluation of new products, component engineering and database, test development, design and build of high level assembly lines, and environmental durability testing. Its services also comprise sourcing and procurement services; manufacturing, assembling, and testing of electronic products for the professional market; redesign, repair, and maintenance; and logistics and distribution services. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Billingstad, Norway.
